tasks.views package¶

Submodules¶

tasks.views.session_views module¶

class tasks.views.session_views.SessionDelete(**kwargs)¶

Bases: tasks.mixins.DeletionAllowedMixin, core.views.DeleteView

delete(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Deletes the Session and updates the Study and other Sessions. Completely overrides the default delete function (as that calls delete too late for us).

get_success_url()¶
model¶

alias of tasks.models.Session

success_message = 'Sessie verwijderd'¶

class tasks.views.task_views.TaskDelete(**kwargs)¶

Bases: tasks.mixins.DeletionAllowedMixin, core.views.DeleteView

Deletes a Task

delete(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Deletes the Task and updates the Session. Completely overrides the default delete function (as that calls delete too late for us).
